intro: Actinocephalus robustus, commonly known as the robust starwort, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Asteraceae, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant features a basal rosette of leaves with a rough, hairy texture, and its flowers are typically yellow to orange in color. It produces small, wind-pollinated flowers that develop into fluffy, white seed heads. Actinocephalus robustus is often found in rocky or sandy soils and is adapted to arid environments.
